contaminate.translation[0].definitions[0: to make a place or substance dirty or harmful by putting something such as chemicals or poison in it
Drinking water supplies are believed to have been contaminated.
contaminate.translation[0].definitions[1: to influence something in a way that has a bad effect
He claims the poster ads have ‘contaminated Berlin’s streets’.
contaminate.translation[1].definitions[0: to make something dirty and dangerous, for example with chemicals or poison
A large number of eggs were contaminated with salmonella.
contaminate.translation[1].definitions[1: to spoil goods carried by a ship, especially by sea water getting into them
